title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15 ยง 54.2 - Definitions
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15 ยง 54.2 - Definitions

State Regulations
(a) Protective
helmet. A device primarily intended to protect the upper part of the wearer's
head against a blow. (b) Goggles or
face shield. An eye protection device as defined in American National Standard

Institute's Z87.1 as most recently amended. (c) [Reserved]
(d) Wind screen. A device mounted on a
motorcycle forward of the rider designed to deflect wind and/or small flying
objects from the body and face of the rider. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15
ยง
54.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
